name: Endless Lumper
description:
The November collaboration of the 'Lumpy' community.

 The characters are by their respective artists (credited in-game) Background art and music by me. Intro screen, and UI, and actual game assembled by SalamiChild Follow him on twitter!

Share your high score on our discord

We do fun collaborations every month! Come check out the Lumpy Pixel Art stream!
